4319290.name: Void Cargo: Equilibrium
4319290.description:
Fly cargo contracts across a remote, hostile world where every delivery matters

Plan your routes, balance mass, thrust, and fuel, and deliver sensitive cargo to distant outposts. The work is calm, methodical, and precise. Until the environment and your ship begin to punish every mistake.

Navigate shifting wind fields, avoid active lightning rifts, and thread your way past massive drilling operations. Clean flying, forward planning, and a strong feel for inertia are essential when time pressure, fuel consumption, and cargo value work against each other.

Between runs, you prepare for the next job

Upgrade thrust, efficiency, and cargo capacity, unlock more lucrative routes, and decide how much risk you’re willing to take. When systems fail mid-flight, staying calm matters: perform emergency repairs and keep the ship under control.

Crashes are part of the job. Repair, refuel, and launch again

Success doesn’t come from perfect runs, but from learning, optimizing, and continuously balancing risk against reward.

Key Features

  • Weighty, Newtonian physics focused on mass, inertia, and control

  • Multiple maps across different moons, each with unique routes and hazards

  • Pure sandbox: no campaign, no fail state, just you and the job

  • Dynamic environmental conditions that affect planning and timing

  • Emergency repair events during active flights

  • Upgrade shop with stackable buffs and clear trade-offs

  • Open delivery economy: choose contracts, routes, and risk freely

  • Great Steam Deck support (tested on Steam Deck for every build); gamepad recommended

  • Generous respawn loop that rewards efficiency, experience, and bold decisions
